Member Function Documentation

bool Tibia.Objects.Creature.InParty (  ) 

Check if a player (creature) is in your party.

Returns:
True if the player is a member or leader of your party. False otherwise.

bool Tibia.Objects.Creature.IsAttacking (  ) 

Check if the creature is attacking the player.

Returns:

bool Tibia.Objects.Creature.Attack (  ) 

Attack the creature. Sends a packet to the server and sets the red square around the creature.

Returns:

bool Tibia.Objects.Creature.Look (  ) 

Look at the creature / player. Sends a packet to the server with the same effect as shift-clicking or left-right clicking a creature.

Returns:
